Speaker: Milo
Text: Guh!  You’re strong, but I’m not done yet!

Speaker: Milo
Text: No!  You didn’t show mercy to Mr. Fluffy!  This is payback!

Speaker: Dr. G
Text: Stop this Milo!  Stop it now before it’s too late!

Speaker: Milo
Text: Too late?!  It’s already too late for Mr. Fluffy!  What, you want me to walk home hand-in-hand with these bastards?!

Speaker: Milo
Text: You murdered my friends!  How did you think I’d react!?

Speaker: Kitty
Text: They were killing civilians!  Have you forgotten what heroes do?

Speaker: Milo
Text: Shut up!  I’ll kill you all!

Speaker: Ryker
Text: No!  I don’t want to hurt you, Milo!

Speaker: Dr. G
Text: I’m sorry, Milo.  I was hoping things would work out, but the Superhero Police are on their way.

Speaker: Dr. G
Text: I wish it was.  There’s nothing I can do for you now.
